title: Brooklyn Nets ' revenue 2001 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 18 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 01/02 to 11/12, rapidly increasing from 11/12 to 12/13, roughly constant from 12/13 to 15/16, slightly increasing from 15/16 to 16/17, and lastly roughly constant from 16/17 to 18/19.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 11/12 and 12/13.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 304.0 was reported at Year 18/19
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 84.0 was reported at Year 11/12
